name: TS!UNDERSWAP PAPYRUS FIGTH
description:
This is an unitale normal figth. Is a little bit bugged but yeah is a demo yet so we cant say too much about it.

Here you woll confront a Pacifist TS!Papyrus. This guy can spare you turns sometimes also he haves some easy attacks but dont anger him too much because you are probaly regretting it if you try.

Anyway this is an infinite game he will never die and you cant heal. You have level 19 and your name is ALE because the name of my channel. 

Actually i think thats all you need to know for now, the last thing i will tell you is please have fun and also suscribe to my youtube channel. Because i will be doing a Pizza Tower Series. So please have fun. Also remember to check the download instructions they are IMPORTANT. So dont forget. Welp bye.
